divs: Sighting DetailsDriving N on Aurelius and looked to the E and saw 2 planes that had intersected. In the middle of the 2 planes was a humongous disc was illuminated by the sun. It was pretty high up, but was plain as day. I passed a tree, and then it was gone. I turned down a side road and again saw the planes, but no object.
Summary: 2 planes intersected and a huge shiny metallic object was seen, and then gone.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Lansing
There were no other sightings in Lansing on or around October 8th 2012
